name: Turf Wars Online
description:
A 2d multiplayer platformer shooting game. Its a cross plateform game, and can also be played on android. Both android and pc servers can be played on vice versa.

To do- Singleplayer, More maps, Jump pads, Achievements, More drop items, HiScore Sheet(will connect scores form kongregate,newgrounds and itch.io), more player characters, more guns, more animated maps.

I am an amateur student. My aim is to improve my hobby of game making and make a famous 2d game before I get old and die. Its something I would like to achieve in my lifetime. Not for money but for personal satisfaction.

Please donate, even a little if you think my game is good enough.

Web Version- Toon Wars Online

Android Version- Toon Wars Multiplayer
